conversations.content: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employees WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '개발' AND e.status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '영업' AND e.status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '인사' AND e.status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT d.name as department, COUNT(*) as count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY d.name
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees WHERE position = '사원' AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees WHERE position IN ('과장', '부장') AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees WHERE YEAR(join_date) = 2023
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees WHERE status = 'LEAVE'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM employees WHERE status = 'RESIGNED'
SELECT AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '개발'
SELECT AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '영업'
SELECT AVG(base_salary) as avg_salary FROM salaries

SELECT d.name as department, AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY avg_salary DESC
SELECT e.name, s.base_salary FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id ORDER BY s.base_salary DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT MIN(base_salary) as min_salary FROM salaries
SELECT SUM(base_salary) as total_salary FROM salaries
SELECT SUM(bonus) as total_bonus FROM salaries
SELECT AVG(s.bonus) as avg_bonus FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '개발'
SELECT e.name, s.base_salary FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id WHERE s.base_salary >= 5000000
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM salaries WHERE base_salary < 4000000
SELECT e.position, AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id GROUP BY e.position ORDER BY avg_salary DESC
SELECT AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.position = '부장'
SELECT AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.position = '사원'
SELECT e.name, (s.base_salary + s.bonus) as total FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT e.name FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id WHERE s.bonus = 0
SELECT e.name, s.bonus FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id WHERE s.bonus >= 1000000
SELECT SUM(s.base_salary) as total FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '인사'
SELECT SUM(s.bonus) as total FROM salaries s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '영업'
SELECT base_salary as median_salary FROM salaries ORDER BY base_salary LIMIT 1 OFFSET (SELECT COUNT(*)/2 FROM salaries)
SELECT e.name FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.date = CURDATE() AND a.status = 'LATE'
SELECT e.name, a.check_in, a.status FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.date = '2024-01-02'
SELECT a.date, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.status FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.name = '김철수' ORDER BY a.date
SELECT COUNT(*) as late_count FROM attendance WHERE status = 'LATE' AND MONTH(date) = MONTH(CURDATE())
SELECT e.name, COUNT(*) as vacation_days FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'VACATION' GROUP BY e.name
SELECT DISTINCT e.name FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'ABSENT'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '개발' AND a.status = 'LATE'
SELECT e.name, COUNT(*) as late_count FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'LATE' GROUP BY e.name ORDER BY late_count DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT e.name FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'VACATION' AND MONTH(a.date) = 1
SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'PRESENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as attendance_rate FROM attendance
SELECT d.name, COUNT(*) as late_count FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE a.status = 'LATE' GROUP BY d.name
SELECT DISTINCT e.name FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.check_in < '09:00:00'
SELECT e.name, a.date, a.check_out FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.check_out > '18:30:00'
SELECT AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(check_in))/3600 as avg_check_in_hour FROM attendance WHERE check_in IS NOT NULL
SELECT e.name FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.date = '2024-01-03' AND a.status = 'ABSENT'
SELECT e.name, COUNT(*) as late_count FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'LATE' GROUP BY e.name HAVING late_count >= 2
SELECT e.name, a.date FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'VACATION' AND WEEK(a.date) = WEEK(CURDATE())
SELECT e.name, COUNT(*) as work_days FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'PRESENT' GROUP BY e.name ORDER BY work_days DESC

SELECT e.name, COUNT(*) as vacation_days FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '영업' AND a.status = 'VACATION' GROUP BY e.name

SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'PRESENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as rate FROM attendance a JOIN employees e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '인사'
SELECT ev.year, ev.quarter, ev.score, ev.feedback FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.name = '김철수'
SELECT AVG(score) as avg_score FROM evaluations
SELECT e.name, ev.score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE ev.score >= 4.0
SELECT e.name, ev.score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id ORDER BY ev.score DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT MIN(score) as min_score FROM evaluations
SELECT d.name, AVG(ev.score) as avg_score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT AVG(ev.score) as avg_score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '개발'
SELECT e.name, ev.score, ev.feedback FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '영업'
SELECT e.name, ev.score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE ev.year = 2023 AND ev.quarter = 4
SELECT e.name, ev.score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE ev.score < 3.5
SELECT e.position, AVG(ev.score) as avg_score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id GROUP BY e.position ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT AVG(ev.score) as avg_score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.position = '부장'
SELECT e.name, ev.feedback FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE ev.feedback LIKE '%리더십%'
SELECT FLOOR(score) as score_range, COUNT(*) as count FROM evaluations GROUP BY FLOOR(score)
SELECT e.name, e.position, ev.score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE ev.score >= 4.5
SELECT AVG(ev.score) as avg_score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '인사'
SELECT AVG(ev.score) as avg_score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.position = '사원'
SELECT e.name, ev.feedback FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE ev.feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT quarter, AVG(score) as avg_score FROM evaluations GROUP BY quarter ORDER BY quarter
SELECT e.name, ev.score FROM evaluations ev JOIN employees e ON ev.emp_id = e.emp_id ORDER BY ev.score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT e.name, e.email, d.name as department, e.position, e.join_date FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.name = '김철수'
SELECT e.name, e.position FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '개발' AND e.status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT e.name, d.name as department FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.position = '부장'
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees WHERE YEAR(join_date) = 2024
SELECT e.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.location = '서울'
SELECT e.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.location = '부산'
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), join_date) >= 1825
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), join_date) < 365
SELECT name, email FROM employees WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT d.name as department, GROUP_CONCAT(e.name) as employees FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY d.name
SELECT e.name, d.name as department FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.position = '대리'
SELECT e.name, d.name as department FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.position = '과장'
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees ORDER BY join_date LIMIT 1
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees ORDER BY join_date
SELECT e.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '영업' AND e.position = '과장'
SELECT e.name, e.email FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.name = '인사'
SELECT position, COUNT(*) as count FROM employees WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY position
SELECT d.location, COUNT(*) as count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY d.location
SELECT e.name, d.name as department, s.base_salary FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id ORDER BY s.base_salary DESC
SELECT e.name, ev.score, s.base_salary FROM employees e JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id ORDER BY ev.score DESC
SELECT d.name, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(s.base_salary) as total_salary FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id GROUP BY d.name

SELECT e.name, COUNT(a.att_id) as late_count, ev.score FROM employees e JOIN attendance a ON e.emp_id = a.emp_id JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'LATE' GROUP BY e.name, ev.score ORDER BY late_count DESC
SELECT AVG(s.base_salary) as avg_salary FROM employees e JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id WHERE ev.score >= 4.5
SELECT e.name, ev.score, d.name as department FROM employees e JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE ev.score < 3.5

SELECT e.name, s.base_salary, ev.score FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id WHERE d.name = '개발'

SELECT e.name, COUNT(a.att_id) as vacation_days, s.base_salary FROM employees e JOIN attendance a ON e.emp_id = a.emp_id JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id WHERE a.status = 'VACATION' GROUP BY e.name, s.base_salary ORDER BY vacation_days DESC
SELECT e.name, s.base_salary, ev.score FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id WHERE e.position = '부장'
SELECT e.name, e.join_date, ev.score FROM employees e JOIN evaluations ev ON e.emp_id = ev.emp_id WHERE e.position = '사원' ORDER BY e.join_date DESC
